name: 2 Late 2 Evade
description:
In 2 Late 2 Evade, all you have are your driving skills to ride at high speed between other cars on the most dangerous roads. There are no rules and no allies in the deserts, canyons and forests.



Experience nonstop action - Pick a car & jump into an action-packed journey. Face extreme environments in a richly created world.



Your car, your identity - 15 unique vehicles to unlock and customize. Personalize your bodywork with fresh paint jobs to show off your car to the world.



Test your handling skills - Enter the temporary state of slow motion and turn your vehicle at excessive angles. Fight your way using skill and tons of nitrous.
